phrases: You have Shinigami-sama's pardon.
I will have you attend lessons from this afternoon on.
I will pick you up later, so get ready.
Any response?
You know...
If a living person cannot take a step out of that room, what are we to do?
Hello...?
She really hates me...
I called out to her many times, but she is just so scared of coming out...
In the end, she told me she does not know how to deal with zombies...
Is that so?
If all she does is sulk, then even I cannot help her.
The quarters are just ahead.
I will finally be able to meet Crona!
You have a good grasp on Crona's soul's wavelength, right?
In order to get her used to Shibusen quickly, I would like you to teach her whatever you can.
If that is all, then I will be glad to do it!
I appreciate it.
Getting lost in such a place...
It is so cold.
I am bad with directions!
How much longer?!
She is finally here...
While you are at it, please show her around, too.
I have a feeling I have walked through here already...
Sid!
Excuse me for a moment.
I thought I was going to die from being lost back there!
Did not you graduate from here?
A Delightful and Embarrassing Trial Attendance!
Shibusen's New Lifestyle Assistance Fair In Session?
Devil Sword Wielder, Crona...
The one who inherited the madness that the witch Medusa left behind.
By melting Ragnarok, a normal Demonic Weapon in the Black Blood, and infusing it into Crona,
To turn a Demonic Weapon into a Death Scythe, a witch's soul is required...
In the end, the ones to make the Demonic Weapons evolve might not be the Meister, but the witches instead...
You cannot stand it, can you?
Holding back is not good, you know...
You want to tear things apart, right?
Anything and everything...
You want to know more about it, do not you?
About that child I made...
You are being infected with madness...
I am looking forward to it.
Pardon me for intruding!
Huh?
No one's here though...
Maka...
What are you doing over there?
The room's Mr. Smith calms me down.
Do not give names to areas like that.
Here, stand up.
O-Okay.
I will show you around the school now.
Uhm...
You...
You know...
Let us continue to get along, Crona.
Yeah.
Hey, hey!
This is Marie-sensei.
Pleased to meet you.
I am also starting out in this school, as a teacher.
In that sense, I am just like you, Crona.
Let us do our best together.
Yeah.
Reassuring her by sharing the same worries...
Nice job, Marie!
Crona?
The blue person is looking over here!
It is scary!
Sid, stop doing that, please!
Even though Sid-sensei looks like a blue hoodlum gorilla, he is really a nice person, so relax.
Okay...
Now then!
The short high-school life will not wait for us!
Let us go outside.
Do not think everything will go your way, you annoying bunch!
There he is.
The little Ragnarok...
What is that?
So cute...
This was all your fault, you know?!
Ugly woman!
I do not know anything about that.
Besides, I do not remember ever becoming one of your buddies!
But if you are like this, even if I get close, I will not be harmed.
Those panties are even more boring than I thought.
Ugly.
I am... I am sorry!
I am sorry!
I will not do it anymore!
No, Crona...
I am the one who should apologize...
Here, take a look, Crona...
It will not be scary.
It is bright...
Uhm... did I... Did I say something weird?
Uhm... did I... Did I say something weird?
How was it?
Being shown around the school?
Think you will do okay?
Just as I thought, it is impossible for me...
Do not worry, everyone is here for you.
I cannot do it!
I want to go back to the room's Mr. Smith...
I will send you flying back!
Stop it!
If so, then how about this?
Write poetry.
Write poetry, you say...
You know, when I feel down, I write lots of poetry.
Are you serious?
You are a real gloomy one, are not you?
Let me give you some counseling!
Let us write poetry together.
If Maka says so...
It... it... it... it... it...
It... it... it... it... it...
It... it... it... it... it...
It... it... it... it... it...
It... it... it... it... it...
It... it... it... it... it... it... it...
It... it... it... it... it... it... it...
It... it... it... it... it... it... it...
It... it... it... it... it... it... it...
It... it... it... it... it... it... it...
It... it... it... it... it... it... it...
It... it... it... it... it... it... it...
It is done?
Yeah.
Let us see...
This is so dumb...
What... do you think?
I apologize for being born...
How gloomy...
With such a fine weather, what are you bean sprouts doing inside the room?
Well, my existence is like that of the sun.
If you have worries, then behold me!
I am sure to brighten your paths!
Here.
I apologize for being born...
What great destructive power...
I apologize for being born...
I apologize for being born...
I apologize for coming back to life...
What, you were here, too?
Well, it concerns Crona.
There are still some issues, but I believe she will get used to it some day.
I am glad to hear it!
But, somehow, you do not look so good, Sid-kun.
Are you feeling bad?
No, it is nothing.
As such, Crona is headed to the Czech Republic.
She is accompanying Maka on her extracurricular lesson.
Did something happen?
I heard that most of the villagers are puppet engineers, so it is a pretty different village.
It seems the eldest golem that was built there suddenly started to act violently.
Fortunately, there has not been any serious damage yet, but...
Hold on... is that true?
What is?
These golems, you see, are there to protect something, and programmed only to defend.
Acting violently and destroying something is unthinkable.
This might be related to the Wavelength of Madness.
Sid-kun, contact Stein-kun.
I want to hear his opinion.
This is the village of Loew?
It is full of chimneys, is not it?
It is a village that thrives on crafting golems, after all.
There is probably a kiln in every house.
Let us start gathering an abundance of souls!
We are not doing things like that anymore.
Since we are going to be students of Shibusen.
Where is the rampaging golem we heard about?
I will go ask the villagers about the incident, okay?
Puppet engineers...
Enchanters...
Puppet engineers...
Enchanters...
This village's traditional huge gloves can amass magical power.
Then they manipulate the earth and create golems.
They do not have welcoming faces at all, huh?
Soul!
When I asked about the golems, they all said they did not know anything about them.
They must be hiding something...
Hey, you guys!
Seems like you have been asking around about the incident.
You are looking for the rampaging golem, right?
I am Giriko, an Enchanter.
I will show you around, so follow me.
Soul, this is terrible!
Yeah, looks that way.
Do you even know what is so terrible?
No, I do not really know yet...
Jeez, get a hold of yourself!
You are saying you know what it is?
Of course!
It is real trouble!
Then, what is it?
I do not really know yet...
You have no clue either!
Soul, I heard that Shinigami-sama knows what that terrible thing is.
Is that so?
As expected of Shinigami-sama.
He plays dumb, but he actually knows a lot.
Hurry!
We do not have much time!
Alright, I am going to floor it!
Hang on!
Wait, Soul!
I know we are in a hurry, but obey the speed limits!
Everyone, make sure you wear a helmet.
Be careful you do not slip on wet floors too, okay?
What are you doing in such a dark place?
Hey, Stein?
Stein?
Marie?
Are you alright?
Yeah...
Besides that... what is it?
A message from Shinigami-sama.
The eldest golem in the village of Loew is on a rampage.
You have a teapot, but what about the cups?
Use that.
Pour it in that?
Anyway, it seems like he wants to hear your opinion.
Is there something peculiar about this incident?
Even though a golem is created to ward off evil, it does not have a program to destroy things.
With the latest techniques, it is possible to craft a golem with a different program.
But the one that is causing the problem is the eldest golem...
Could it be related to the Wavelength of Madness?
Even if that is so, the sequence is weird, is not it?
The sequence?
Since the Kishin was revived, there has not been a single incident related to the Wavelength of Madness, fortunately.
It is not unfathomable for a soulless golem going on a rampage is the first incident.
I see.
The first ones to be influenced should be humans.
In that sense, a golem being the first is certainly strange.
A rampaging golem would, so to speak, mean a world that is already engulfed in a state of madness.
And that would be odd if I am still this frivolous.
Hey, wait a second...
I am going to Shibusen's library.
Tell Shinigami-sama that I would like some time.
But I went through the trouble of making coffee...
Oi, how much further until we reach the golem?
It will be very soon.
You have been saying that for a while...
I am getting a bad feeling.
From this village, and from you.
Hey, do not be rude!
This village, you see,
The entrance is protected by a ward against evil.
Everyone is scared of things they do not know.
Are you trying to say that we are evil?
Why do you immediately jump to that conclusion?
He is not trying to say that.
That is exactly what he is saying.
Be quiet.
We want to live quiet, peaceful lives in a village that people keep away from.
So that we will not because any conflict, we remained motionless like golems.
People are the same, right?
If they take off their mask of kindness,
What?
Jeez, you are an impatient woman, are not you?
Seems like there is nothing more to hide.
Soul...
Maka, take stance.
No way, what is the meaning of this?
What is wrong, Maka?
What is going on?
A golem is an object, right?
Even though it is not supposed to be alive...
Though you are a young Meisterin, it seems like you have noticed.
I have been waiting for this moment...
With Enchanter techniques, I embedded my own memories into my own child.
I repeated this crappy, boring life around thirty times...
800 years... what does he mean?
This was all because of that Shinigami and his organization...
For the sake of opposing Shibusen, I needed to gather power.
But that is all over...
Time to say goodbye to being a good boy...
What is he?
I do not need a Meister.
I will use myself with the golem I crafted!
He is a Demonic Weapon?
On top of that, a golem with a soul.
What is going on in this village?
You should stop making any more direct attacks.
As it is, if this goes on,
I have not started the engine yet.
Maka!
What is up with this wavelength?
Such an intense killing intent...
I cannot stop...
The engine's on!
My soul's wavelength...
It is not just from that one-hour of forcing myself to smile at you!
So I would not be marked by Shibusen, I had no choice!
My life up to now was nothing!
It was just crap!
Shoe!
Shot!
Crack!
Shoe!
Shot!
Crack!
Shoe!
Shot!
Crack!
That did not have any meaning, idiot!
Maka!
Damn...
How long has it been, I cannot remember how to enjoy it...
My true self...
Uhm... the words will not come out!
That is right!
It is that... that...!
The thing I kept building up until now...
I kind of...
I was overwhelmed because of our difference in mass.
If only I could attack from a range...!
But if I show an opening, I will be sent flying...
There is Crona's Screech Alpha.
I just wanted to say it.
We are only supposed to observe, you see?
We will not lend a hand.
Even if you give me three pieces of candy.
Ragnarok...
Four pieces, then!
It is just a figure of speech!
I do not really want any candy.
Idiot, I am not a kid!
How about six pieces?
It is not a matter of how many!
Fifteen pieces!
As many as you want!
Just do it!
What?!
Maka Albarn, you have a way with words.
I was just negotiating.
Eh?
The rotation speed of the chainsaw did not cut you up?
Do not underestimate the Black Blood, dammit!
I fought against that thing?
I am glad we became friends.
Ragnarok.
You have shrunk a little bit, are you alright?
No problem, dummy!
You will not be able to hurt Maka any more.
If you are troubled and feel like writing poetry,
Let us go, Maka.
Yeah.
